channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Ibtana

item.title: CVE-2022-4674|2024-08-03T01:48:39.549Z -- unknown -- ibtana
item.description: The Ibtana WordPress plugin before 1.1.8.8 does not validate and escape one of its shortcode attributes, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attack
